layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x66
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x66
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x50
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 408x50 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 406x48
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 406x44
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 200x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 177x39
                text run at (2,2) width 177: "This column should be 200px"
                text run at (2,22) width 29: "wide"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (204,2) size 200x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
